server

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.NetworkNode
      • server.Client

  • public class Client
extends NetworkNode
    A class run in combination with a Server/Network. It takes jobs from the network which describe something to be rendered, renders the job, and sends it back to the network. In other words, it can be used to help a network render deep zooms of a fractal.
    Author:
    Calvin

      • init

        public void init(Log log,
                 java.lang.String ip)
        Connects to the server and initializes anything that needs to be initialized.
        Parameters:
        log - The log the client and all the objects it creates will use to log and print information.

      • getFractal

        public RenderManager getFractal()
        Used to get the fractal the client uses to render
        Returns:
        the fractal the client uses to render

      • setFractal

        public void setFractal(RenderManager fractal)
        Used to set the fractal the client uses to render
        Parameters:
        fractal - the new fractal for the client to use in rendering

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Used to close the Client when it is done being used. It will end the main loop and shut down the SocketWrapper that connects the client to the network.
        Specified by:
        kill in class NetworkNode
